General_Description: '''Red Fire''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta]]ns have nothing in their heads, so an arrow might not kill them. You can still try, but burn the others."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra took on the contract, killing several Spartan [[soldier]]s with [[spear]]s, fire, and headshots.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
